meanings.definition: Relating to the process of providing or obtaining the food necessary for health and growth.
meanings.sent1: A balanced diet is essential for good nutritional health.
meanings.sent2: The nutritional value of fruits and vegetables is well-known.
meanings.sent3: I tried to eat a nutritional brick, but it didn't taste very good.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening was like a nutritional source of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The nutritional benefits of exercise are often underestimated.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to nutrients or nutrition.
meanings.sent1: The nutritional content of the meal was carefully calculated.
meanings.sent2: She attended a nutritional workshop to learn more about healthy eating.
meanings.sent3: The nutritional facts on the cereal box made me laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a nutritional guide for living a better life.
meanings.sent5: The nutritional information on the label was easy to understand.
